newsitem.title: USA: Omega Research Inc plans 3.7 mln share IPO.
newsitem.headline: Omega Research Inc plans 3.7 mln share IPO.

text.p: Omega Research Inc said Tuesday that it has filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a proposed initial public offering of up to 3.7 million shares of common stock.
A portion of the shares will be sold by certain selling shareholders, said Onega, and the lead underwriters will be Robertson, Stephens & Company LLC, Lehman Brothers Inc and Hambrecht & Quist LLC.
Omega estimates that the initial public offering price will be between $10.00 and $12.00 per share.
Omega is a provider of real-time investment analysis software for the Microsoft Windows operating system.
